titleInfo.title: The Klein Family of New York at the National Home for Jewish Children at Denver

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 7 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: ''#388 Residents of Nat. Home for Jewish Children'' and ''Jewish Sheltering Home 1910-1950s''. On back of photograph: ''#388 The Klein's of New York Mother Tuberculous Four in one Family. National Home for Jewish Children at Denver 1931 L- Fannie Lubton Front row - Sara Klein, R - Rosie Klein Julius Klein ___ Klein''.

mods.abstract: The four children of the Klein family of New York with another child. From left to right is Fannie Lukton, Sara Klein, Rosie Klein, Julius Klein and their brother whose first name is unknown.
mods.note: Donated by the National Asthma Center.

name.namePart: National Home for Jewish Children in Denver

titleInfo.title: Beck Archives Photograph Collection, Health Care and Philanthropy
